p.b: The word critical has more than one meaning.

questionBody.p: Choose the sentence in which critical means "likely to find faults or problems."

simpleChoice.p: Students are being critical of the food in the school cafeteria when they say it's bad.
To become good at horseback riding, it is critical that you respect the horse.
The press was told that the actress was in critical condition after the accident.
